vars.ocr_text:
Backend Engineer

We are looking for a Backend Engineer to join our growing team.

Responsibilities:
- Design and implement scalable APIs
- Optimize database performance
- Collaborate with frontend team

Requirements:
- 3+ years of experience with Node.js
- Strong knowledge of PostgreSQL
- Experience with Docker and Kubernetes

What we offer:
- Competitive salary
- Stock options
- Flexible working hours

연봉 협상 후기

직급: 시니어 개발자
기본급: 8500만원
성과급: 300% (목표 달성 시)
스톡옵션: 1000주

작년 대비 15% 인상 받았습니다.
팀 성과가 좋아서 협상이 수월했어요.

복지:
- 식대 20만원
- 도서 구입비 무제한
- 재택 주 3회

vars.text: We are looking for a Senior Full-Stack Engineer to join our AI team. You will work on cutting-edge machine learning applications using React, Node.js, and Python. We offer competitive compensation ($150k-$200k), stock options, and comprehensive health benefits. Our team values work-life balance and offers flexible remote work options. Must have 5+ years of experience and strong problem-solving skills.
